casebody.data:
LOCKERBIE GLOVE FACTORY TOWN HOME OWNERS ASSOCIATION, INC., et al., Appellants
v.
INDIANAPOLIS HISTORIC PRESERVATION COMMISSION, et al. Supreme Court of Indiana. October 4, 2018 Transfer Denied.

All Justices concur, except Slaughter, J., who did not participate in the decision of this matter.

Robb, J., Crone, J., Bradford, J.
